## Getting Started
This project uses [devbox](https://github.com/jetpack-io/devbox) to manage its development environment.

Install devbox:
```sh
curl -fsSL https://get.jetpack.io/devbox | bash
```

Start the devbox shell:
```sh 
devbox shell
```

Run a script in the devbox environment:
```sh
devbox run <script>
```
## Scripts
Scripts are custom commands that can be run using this project's environment. This project has the following scripts:

* [test](#devbox-run-test)

## Environment

```sh
VENV_DIR="/home/milton/projects/devbox-init/.devbox/virtenv/python3/.venv"
```

## Shell Init Hook
The Shell Init Hook is a script that runs whenever the devbox environment is instantiated. It runs 
on `devbox shell` and on `devbox run`.
```sh
/home/milton/projects/devbox-init/.devbox/virtenv/python3/bin/venvShellHook.sh
echo 'Welcome to devbox!' > /dev/null
```
